item.title: The Beauty of Reticulate
item.description: Using R and Python Together! A very handy use of RStudio is that Python can be run in it rather than needing another platform to run python in. To do so, you will need to install the package: reticulate in R. This is what R uses to communicate back and forth with python. Without this package, nothing written in a python code block will run. An example has been included for your benefit below.
